title: Amazing
text: Beautiful place to visit quite a lot off walking wouldn’t advise if you are not very mobile, amazing views lots of other places to see as well as the acropolis

title: Amazin
text: Amazing place to visit well worth it, must admit a lot of walking, only €10 to get in spend as much time as you like there

title: Local
text: Nice friendly place, very local to acropolis within walking distance, local to signamata square where you can get the hop on hop off bus to a lot of places, local to shops, very quiet location, lots of places to visit, very cheap, house keeping very good every day cleaner came in to clean room,

title: Lovely
text: Lovely place to stay very friendly and helpful, only a 2 minute walk from Bondi Beach a very nice place to stay will be staying there again of I can get in, it is a very popular place to stay, very local to shops would recommend looking into it

title: Lovely
text: I only saw it from the river wish I had walked along the bridge didn’t realise how big it was but even from the shore it is such a beautiful sight, can’t wait to go again

title: Great
text: Brilliant place to fish caught every time, shop sold almost everything you need, a choice of 7 lakes to fish from, we fished from Carp lake, as I said I caught every time, only problem we had was the moor hens dived down for the bait

title: Fantastic
text: Lovely clean restaurant, very friendly staff, delicious food good choice from the menu, would recommend a visit to the restaurant

title: Lovely place to stay
text:
I stayed for 8 days and wish I had stayed longer, very clean and tidy big rooms large kitchen and dining area, staff were lovely always very helpful and friendly, every one spoke to each other, t.v, fridge, sink and table in the rooms only down fall was no kettle in the room it would have been nice to have one in the room, very close to the beach, I would recommend staying here I will definitely be staying again,
Jackie

title: Lovely beach
text: Lovely beach very close to the accommodation, every thing you need is all down 1strip of road you don't even have to go into the city for anything all close to hand

title: Hostel
text: Very poor the only good thing was the staff were nice the hostel was poor the staff were very friendly and helpful, rooms were dull very noisy right on a main road, close to the tram a long way from the beach

title: Sydney
text: Beautiful place to visit well worth going to have a look if you are brave enough you can walk the harbour bridgr
